mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (email, address, post_num, order_time, is_delivered) VALUES (#{email}, #{address}, #{postNum}, NOW(), FALSE)
INSERT INTO DETAIL (order_num, coffee_id, quantity) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{coffeeId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE email = #{email} AND post_num = #{postNum} AND DATE(order_time) = CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY order_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORDERS WHERE email = #{email} AND post_num = #{postNum}
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.address, o.post_num, o.order_time, d.detail_num, d.coffee_id, d.quantity FROM ORDERS o LEFT JOIN DETAIL d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE o.email = #{email} ORDER BY o.order_time DESC, d.detail_num ASC
